inputs.materialNarrative: Orange-red crystal pulsing with trapped flames. Warm to touch, occasionally sparks.
Speckled igneous rock with visible crystalline structure. Harder than limestone, more reliable for load-bearing structures.

Soft, silvery-white metal with a mysterious sheen that glows faintly in moonlight. Ancient texts speak of its lunar affinity.
